document_data.title: The Forgotten Land
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Forgotten Land''''' is a one-round tournament adventure module set in the [[Living City]] organized play program. It was published in 1999, and intended for adventurers of all levels.

{{quote|''You receive a summons from Lady Catherine Blacktree requesting your assistance with a secret diplomatic mission to a far away land. The letter states that if you accept this assignment, you will be briefed on some important cultural practices to follow while there. Cultural practices? Where in the world could this mission be sending you?''}}
